name: Arctic Assault
description: Increases the damage of Flurry by 3-39%.

name: Cataclysmic
description: You have a 5-43% chance when landing on the ground to deal 20-420% of your Ability Power as fire damage to nearby enemies.

name: Concussive Chi
description: Secondary attacks have a 1-25% chance to stun targets for 1-4.6 seconds.

name: Concussive Shock
description: Increases the stun duration of Concussive Shot by 0.3-1.5s.

name: Construction
description: Increases repair and upgrade speed during Combat Phase by 25-75%.

name: Corruption's Fortification
description: Armor buff of Dryad's Blessing is increased by 4-40% in purification form.

name: Defensive Critical Damage
description: Increases the Defense Crit Damage of the affected tower by 4-20%.

name: Drenching Strikes
description: Your primary attacks have a 2-30% chance on hit to drench enemies for 3-7 seconds.

name: Electric Paralysis
description: EMP Trap slows enemies to 70-62% speed for 1-3 seconds.

name: Enduring Tornado
description: Increases the knockup duration of Tornado by 1-6 seconds.

name: Enhanced Decoy
description: Holograhic Decoy deals an extra 20-420% damage to enemies.

name: Fortification
description: Increases Defense Health of the affected tower by 2-34%.

name: Fountain Of Speed
description: Abyss Fountain increases allied movement speed by 50-650 for 5 seconds.

name: Ghastly Curse
description: Nether archer arrows now make enemies move at 50-42% speed for 0-4 seconds.

name: Knife Club
description: Increase the damage of Fan of Knives by 3-39%.

name: Retribution
description: When you take damage, you have a 2-20% chance of dealing 125-425% of your Armor as damage to your attacker.

name: Sharpened Ice
description: Ice Shards' piercing damage reduction per enemy hit is reduced by 1-7%.

name: Speed Boost
description: Increases your movement speed by 100-500.

name: Stronghold
description: Increases the Defense Health of the Physical wall by 4-25% and gains 100% Tenacity.

name: Support Magic Specialist
description: Decreases the cost of Broom Vault and Book Drop by 4-40%.

name: Swift Provocation
description: Provoke movement speed buff increased by 10-154.

name: Wither Bubble
description: Arcane Bubble withers enemies inside it increasing the damage they take by 6-15%.

name: Worm Scarf
description: Reduces the damage you take from enemies by 3-15%.

name: Zephyr's Warpath
description: Increase movement speed in Whirlwind by 5-105%.

name: Advanced Rocketry
description: Increases the damage of Bunker Buster by 3-39%.

name: Annoyance
description: Taunts nearby enemies for 1-4 seconds every 8 seconds.

name: Arctic Bulwark
description: Increases the health of Ice Wall by 2-38% and duration by 2-8 seconds.

name: Binding Roots
description: Your slam ability has a 22-50% chance to stun enemies for 0.5 seconds, then root in place for 4.5 seconds.

name: Bots Of Oil
description: Exploding Grav Bots now oil enemies for 1-8 second(s). If ignited by fire, deals 20-220% Ability Power as fire damage per second for 1-5 second(s).

name: Broomnado Power
description: Increases Broom Nado damage by 3-46%.

name: Bulwark
description: Increases armor by 3-39%.

name: Caustic Venom
description: Increases the poison damage of the PufferFish Tower by 10-138%, but reduces its Defense Damage by 20%.

name: Concussive Power
description: Increases the damage of Concussive Shots by 3-39%.

name: Crane Stance
description: Each secondary attack increases the damage of the next primary attack by 10-90%. Stacks up to 6 times.

name: Critical Strike
description: Increases your Hero Crit Chance by 3-10%.

name: Crumbling Stone
description: Enemies petrified by Maw of the Earth Drake receive 2-29% more damage and explode on death for 10-250% Defense Power magical damage.

name: Destruction
description: Increases Defense Power of the affected tower by 2-34%.

name: Dragon's Haste
description: Dragons Nest dragonsâ€™ movement speed is increased by 700-1500.

name: Electric Fingers
description: Skeletal Orcs have 3-30% chance on hit to deal an additional 40-400% of their Defense Health as storm damage. Bounces 3 times.

name: Empowered Flame
description: Flamethrower tower has a 1-15% chance to hit the target again for 55-275% damage.

name: Escalation
description: When the Water Sprite's attacks damage an enemy, the Water Sprite increases its Defense Damage by 1-7% for 2s. Stack up to 6 times.

name: Explosive Blades
description: Daggers thrown by Poison Dagger now stick to the target and explode after 3 seconds for 500-2,000% of Ability Power.

name: Exponential Force
description: Primary attacks increase your homing missiles damage by 10-29%. Stacks up to 10 times.

name: Full Shell Ahead
description: Increases movement speed while in Turtle Stance by 25-525.

name: Fury Speed
description: Increase Projectile Speed of Fury by 0-67%.

name: Glacier's Wrath
description: Increases the damage of Avalanche Strike by 4-40%.

name: Haunting
description: Primary attacks generate 1 ghost stack. At 10 stacks you unleash ghosts for 3 seconds, each dealing 10-250% of your Ability Power as damage. The effect has a cooldown of 5 seconds.

name: Heavy Rounds
description: Increase the damage of the Rail Gun Tower by 5-40%, but lowers the tower's range by 50%.

name: Laser Boost
description: Picking up Mega Death Laser increases EV's movements speed by 50-350 and Hero Damage by 4-40% for 15 seconds.

name: Lashing Power
description: Increases Lash Out damage by 3-46%.

name: Molten Striker
description: Molten Core deals more impact damage the farther it travels, up to +20-200% more damage.

name: Power Volley
description: Increases the damage of Arcane Volley by 3-39%.

name: Quick Orbs
description: Increases the spin rate of Water Orbs by 10-34%.

name: Rippling Explosions
description: Enemies that die inside the boost aura have a 5-25% chance to detonate, dealing 20-80% of the Boost aura's Tower Damage stat as damage in a small area around the enemy.

name: Shroom Doom
description: Damage of Powder Toss while in Corrupt Form increased by 4-40%.

name: Stocked Flame
description: Increases the damage of Flame Thrower by 3-39%

name: Stun Fire
description: Cannonball Tower has a 11-25% chance on hit to stun target for 1.6-3 seconds.

name: Thundering Call
description: Increases Call to Madness range by 4-40%.

name: Withering Fountain
description: Abyss Fountain withers enemies inside it reducing the damage they deal by 2-20%.

name: Amplified Singularity
description: Increases the damage of Singularity Bomb by 3-39%.

name: Atomic Capacity
description: This shard gives your Atomic Launcher an additional missile every 4 upgrade levels.

name: Batter Up
description: Increases the damage of Molten Core by 4-40% each time it is redirected. Happens 3 times.

name: Berserk Master
description: Increases the duration of Direct Command on your Skeletal Orcs by 1-5 seconds.

name: Blazing Phoenix
description: Shortly after a Blaze Balloon triggers, a Phoenix emerges dealing 500-2,500% Defense Power as magical fire damage.

name: Combined Power
description: Serpent's Coil deals 9-45% Defense Damage as magical damage each second when an enemy is also affected by Sand Viper.

name: Corruption's Harmony
description: Reduces Corruption form's Celestial Power drain by 1-3.

name: Critical Restoration
description: Primary Attack critical hits restore 1-5 Broom Power.

name: Current Trade Off
description: Whirlpool no longer displaces enemies, however its damage is increased by 4-40%.

name: Defensive Critical Strike
description: Increases the Defense Crit Chance of the affected tower by an additional 2-15%.

name: Dewey Deathimal System
description: Book drop duration is increased 1-5 second and the extra damage they take is increased 5-15% while under it's effect.

name: Diamond-Tipped Drill
description: Increases the damage of Drill Shot by 3-39%.

name: Dragon Stance
description: Each melee primary attack increases the damage of the next ranged secondary attack by 10-90%. Stacks up to 6 times.

name: Dummies And Bots
description: Holographic Decoy now spawns 4 grav Bots that each deal 20-220% of your Ability as damage in a 100-500 radius. These do not count towards the cap on the number of Bots she can hold.

name: Empowered Mark
description: Increases the max number of the marked targets this hero may have by 2-30.

name: Empowered Throw
description: Increases the damage of Poison Dagger Throw by 3-39%.

name: Encroaching Flames
description: Flame aura has a 6-30% chance to deal 12-104% more damage.

name: Eternal Freeze
description: Increases the duration of the freeze on PermaFreeze by 1-3 seconds.

name: Frenzy
description: Primary Attacks have a 21-26% chance to increase attack speed by 5-30% for 5 seconds. Can only proc once every 7 seconds.

name: Frosty Duet
description: The Frostbite tower can hit an additional target, but its Range is reduced by 60-35%.

name: Fury Restoration
description: Restore 1-2 mana every time Fury scores a critical hit.

name: Harbinger's Slam
description: During Provoke, Seismic Slam damage increased by 130-410% of your Ability Power stat.

name: Heroic Charge
description: Increases the damage of Valiant Charge by 3-39%.

name: High Explosives
description: Increases Bunker Buster projectile damage radius by 16-64%, and reduces damage falloff by 18-42%.

name: Icefall
description: Hailstorm Tower attacks have a 2-5% chance on hit to freeze enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Inspiration
description: Reduces the cooldown of your abilities by 4-39%.

heroes.name: Adept, Apprentice, Dryad, Gunwitch, Huntress, Initiate, Lavamancer, Monk, Mystic, Squire, Mercenary, Countess, Abyss Lord, Engineer, Hunter, Aquarion, Frostweaver, Cyborg

name: Lava Warrior
description: Primary Attacks restore 6-10 Lava Power.

name: Magma Maelstrom
description: Rate at which Fissures of Embermount generate Molten Power increased by 4-39%.

name: Overcharge
description: Increases the Evlish Artillery Cannon's projectile damage radius by 16-64%, and reduces damage falloff by 18-42%.

name: Overclocked Drone
description: Increases the damage of the Cyborg's companion pet by 6-24%.

name: Panic Fire
description: When the affected tower takes damage, it has a 5-15% chance to increase it's Attack Rate by 50% for 1-4 seconds. Does not work with Auras and Traps.

name: Permafrost Punisher
description: Increases the Crit Damage of Ice Shards by 5-21%, and increases its Crit Chance by 2-10%.

name: Piercing
description: Concussive Shots also fires a piercing shard dealing 50-350% of Ability Power as damage, then explodes dealing 25-225% of Ability Power as unresisted damage.

name: Power Bolts
description: Ballista has a 4-40% chance on hit to deal 15-60% extra magical damage.

name: Power Of The Knight
description: Increases the damage of Knight of the Abyss by 3-64%.

name: Press Your Luck
description: When the affected tower takes damage, it has a 5-15% chance to increase it's Critical Hit Chance by 30% for 1-4 seconds. Does not work with Auras and Traps.

name: Protective Chi
description: While Chi Aura is active gain a shield that decreases incoming damage by 13-45%.

name: Quake
description: You have a 10-50% chance when landing to deal 50-250% of your Ability Power as earth damage to nearby enemies.

name: Sanctuary
description: Heroes inside the Arcane Bubble shield heal 5-15% of their health per second during the duration of the bubble.

name: Sentry Rocket
description: The Sentry Turret's attacks generate 1 stack. At 5 stacks, it fires a Rocket dealing 100-150% Defense Damage in an area.

name: Serpent's Appeasement
description: Increases Appeasement gained by 60-300%.

name: Spirit Charge
description: Increases the damage of the Chi Spirit Tower by 5-20%, and increases the projectile size by 10-40%.

name: Turtle Power
description: Increase Damage Protection while in Turtle Stance by 1-21%.

name: Abyss Knight's Bargain
description: Reduces the mana cost of Knight of the Abyss by 4-39%.

name: Abyss Stone Attunement
description: Reduces the mana cost of Abyss Stone by 1-14%.

name: Aerial Mastery
description: Increases movement speed while flying by 300-800.

name: Betsy's Curse
description: Primary attacks leave a curse zone that reduces the damage enemies deal by 5-25%. You can place up to 3 zones and each zones lasts 20-100 seconds.

name: Betsy's Zapper
description: Every 8 seconds, secondary attacks spawn a lightning balldealing 125-325% Ability Power as storm damage 2.5 times per second for 1 seconds.

name: Bewitching Hour
description: Each Snipe hit adds 4-40% to the damage of the next Primary Attack hit. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Big Boy
description: The first Grav Bot placed will always be a Big Boy. Big Boy mines do an additional 100-1100% of hero Damage as damage to enemies in double the area.

name: Blizzard Resurgence
description: Gain 4-16% mana over 5 seconds while in Blizzard Embrace.

name: Boosted Grasp
description: Enemies move at 90-60% speed when they are within the Boost Aura.

name: Bounty
description: Restore 1-6 mana upon defeating an enemy.

name: Cataclysm
description: Increases Eruption damage by 3-39%.

name: Channel
description: Restores 11-25 of your ability resource every 5 seconds.

heroes.name: Apprentice, Monk, Huntress, Squire, Abyss Lord, Initiate, Adept, Mercenary, Countess, Aquarion, Frostweaver

name: Corruption's Bargain
description: Corrupt Blessing gains 0-300 Ability Power. When this shard is fully upgraded, Dryad's Blessing costs no celestial power in purification form and costs 1 celestial power per second instead of 2 in corruption form.

name: Corruption's Blessing
description: Damage of Dryad's Blessing is increase by 4-40% in corrupt form.

name: Deadly Strikes
description: Increases the Defense Range of the affected tower by 3-39%.

name: Drenched
description: After your Geyser Trap drenches an enemy, the Geyser Trap next attack deals 103-135% of it's tower damage.

name: Echoing Shout
description: Increases the duration of Staggering Shout debuffs by 1-6s.

name: Empowered Bolts
description: Enemies hit by the ballista receive an additional 5-20% damage from all sources for 1-6 seconds.

name: Empowered Bulwark
description: Increases the damage of Bubble Bulwark by 3-39%.

name: Empowered Frostbite
description: Frostbite has a 5-45% chance to freeze the target for 1-7 seconds.

name: Empowering Blasphemy
description: Obelisk Hero Stat boost increased to 10-50% and polymorph duration increased by 1-6 seconds.

name: Enhanced Flame
description: Increase the damage of Breath of the Dragon by 3-39%.

name: Enhanced Reconnaissance
description: Increases the Defense Range of the Drone Defense System by 4-20% and gain 100% tenacity.

name: Fight Me Not
description: Defenses will deal 5-25% more damage to enemies targetting the Squire.

name: Frostbite
description: All enemies hit by Cold Snap are inflicted with frostbite, taking 20-420% of your Ability Power as damage for 10 seconds.

name: Frosty Explosion
description: Enemies killed by the Frost Strikes Aura Explode dealing 15-43% of the Frost Aura's Defense Damage as frost damage.

name: Icy Spiders
description: Nether Spiders have a 6-16% chance to spawn a pool of ice on the ground that makes all nearby enemies move at 90-60% speed for 5 seconds. The ice pools last 10 seconds.

name: Jackpot
description: You have a 2-10% chance when picking up gold to quadruple the amount.

name: Kinetic Energy
description: Increases the damage of the Rail Gun Tower by 3-10%, and has a 10-28% chance on hit to stun the target for 0.4-3.2 seconds.

name: Laser Rounds
description: Your attacks have a 30% chance to spawn a laser that pierces enemies dealing 100-200% of your Hero Damage as Electric damage.

name: Lava Floor
description: Eruption spawns a lava field dealing 150-1150% Ability Power as Fire magic damage each second for 5s.

name: Lingering Poison
description: Daggers thrown by Poison Dagger Throw now poison the target for 100-800% of Ability Power for 1.2-5.2s.

name: Melting Point
description: When the Countess deals fire damage to an enemy, there is a 20% chance to ignite their armor, causing them to take 10-30% extra damage for 1-5s.

name: Numerous Reflections
description: Increases the nodes EV2's Reflect Beam can sustain by 1-6.

name: Oil Slick
description: Increases the duration of oil flask by 1-9s.

name: Oil Spill
description: Gives oil geyser a 5-30% chance to stun all enemies hit for 2s.

name: Overwhelm
description: Your attacks have a 7-15% chance to stun one enemy for 1-3 seconds. Can only affect one enemy at a time.

name: Overwhelming Buster
description: Adds 0.5-4.5s to Blunder Broom Buster duration.

name: Plasma Burst
description: When the Plasma Defense hits a target it has 50% chance to overload dealing 27-65% damage to nearby enemies.

name: Powder Shot
description: Increases the Defense Power of the Flak Cannon by 2-34%, and attunes it to fire damage.

name: Rain Of Oil
description: Skeletal Archer's Direct Command now oils enemies, slowing them by 50% for 2-8 seconds. If an oiled enemy is hit by fire damage, the oil ignites, dealing 20-600% of its Defense Power in fire damage over 1-5 seconds.

name: Scorching Steam
description: Increases the damage of Steam Blast by 3-39%.

name: Shielding Guard
description: When the affected tower takes damage, it has a 5-25% chance to gain a shield for 50-250% of it's Defense Health for 5 seconds. Does not work with Auras or Traps.

name: Thunderwave
description: Arc Lightning deals 250-1250% Ability Power as damage to all enemies around you.

name: Tormented Power
description: Increases Dark Torment damage by 3-39%.

name: Abyssal Mandate
description: Reduces the mana cost of Direct Command by 4-39%.

name: Arc Shielding
description: Arc Lightning places a shield on you lasting 20 seconds and absorbing 180-780% Ability Power of damage. Enemies that hit the shield are damaged for a total of 200-1000% of your Ability Power over 3 seconds.

name: Beacon Of The Storm
description: Once per second your primary attack spawns a lightning ball that deals 10-50% of your Hero Damage as storm damage. Bounces up to 3 times.

name: Betsy's Beam
description: Primary attacks fire a piercing sonic projectile that deals 105-150% Hero Damage as magical damage.

name: Call Of The Kobold
description: Defeating an enemy grants a charge. Secondary attacks consume charges and shoots a firework at your target for 20-320% of your ability power.

name: Caustic Oil
description: Increases the damage of Oil Flask by 3-39%.

name: Celestial Attunement
description: The Dryad can hold 1-4 more stacks of starfall.

name: Charge Blast V2
description: Reduces the cost of EV's secondary attacks by 10-100%.

name: Critical Allocation
description: Increases the defense Crit damage of the Elvish Artillery Cannon by 30-46% and Crit Chance by 5-21%, but lowers the tower's range by 25%.

name: Darkest Syphon
description: Increases the angle of Dark Syphon by 3-30.

name: Defense Rate
description: Increases the Attack Rate of the affected tower by 9-33%.

name: Draining Strikes
description: Increase the healing from Siphon Stance by 10-150%.

name: Earth Toss
description: Earthshatter tower has a 28-100% chance on hit to knock targets into the air and gains 100-280 Damage Radius.

name: Electric Retribution
description: When you take damage, you have a 2-20% chance of dealing 125-425% of your Armour as storm damage to your attacker.

name: Empowering Aura
description: Flame Aura and Water Aura increase Hero Damage and Ability Power of heroes standing inside them by 5-25%.

name: Enduring Drop
description: Increases Book Drop duration by 0.5-7.5s.

name: Enduring Flame
description: Increases the damage of Breath of the Dragon burn by 13-50% and increase the burn duration by 1-4s.

name: Enduring Lash
description: Increases Lash Out poison duration by 0.5-4.5 s.

name: Enduring Orbs
description: Decreases the mana cost of Water Orbs by 1-4 mana per second.

name: Enhanced Current
description: Increases the suction strength of Whirpool by 10-36.67%.

name: Enhanced Scan
description: Amplifies the Biometric Scanner's effect, causing enemies to take 4-28.2% more damage while in range.

name: Explosive Surprise
description: Geyser Trap has a 10-50% chance to fire an exploding shard dealing 200-220% Defense Damage as damage in an area.

name: Fan Of Knights
description: Skeletal Knight also fires two additional Knights that deal 20-500% of your Ability Power in damage.

name: Follow Through
description: Increases the damage of Sweeping Strikes by 3-39%.

name: Freeze Buster
description: Blunder Broom Buster has a 1-5% chance to also freeze enemies for 1-4s, allowing them to be shattered by Crushing damage.

name: Frost Fortress
description: Increases the explosive damage of Ice Wall by 5-41%

name: Frozen Core
description: Increases Ice Needle damage by 4-39%.

name: Hemolytic Poison
description: Lashout cooldown increased to 200-160% of what it was but allows it to stack 0-2 times and increases its duration by 3-7 seconds.

name: Holy Empowerment
description: Increases damage by 5-20% while Holy Fire is active.

name: Inspiring Strikes
description: Primary attacks reduce the cooldown of your abilities by 0.1-0.3 seconds.

heroes.name: Abyss Lord, Adept, Apprentice, Dryad, Ev2, Gunwitch, Huntress, Initiate, Lavamancer, Monk, Mystic, Squire, Mercenary, Countess, Engineer, Hunter, Aquarion, Frostweaver

name: Insulated Decoy
description: Decreases heat generated from Holographic Decoy by 3-39%.

name: Lasting Conflagration
description: Increases Elder Dragon burn duration by 1-3 seconds.

name: Lateral Blast
description: Volcano attacks spawn three random meteors that drop nearby, each dealing 50-120% of Defense Damage as magical Fire damage.

name: Let's Rock
description: Activating Harden/Inflame gives the Lavamancer a shield lasting for 6-30 seconds that absorbs 20-140% Hero Health incoming damage.

name: Manabomb's Aid
description: Manabomb places a shield on you that lasts 20 seconds that absorbs 150-750% of your Ability Power Stat. Enemies that hit the shield are burned for a total of 150-550% of your Ability Power over 3 seconds.

name: Marking Bubble
description: Arcane Bubble will place a Mark on all enemies in the initial spawn area and increases Mark count 1-6.

name: Mine Blast Radius
description: Anti Gravity Bots damage radius increased by 3-39%.

name: Piercing Power
description: Increases the damage of Piercing Shot by 3-39%.

name: Plated Armor
description: Imbues the Royal Guard's armor, making enemy projectiles deal 76-40% of their original damage.

name: Polar Vortex
description: Increases the damamge of Cold Snap by 4-40%.

name: Puncturing Bolts
description: Ballista can now pierce an additional 1-4 targets.

name: Sandstorm Warrior
description: The Snaking Sands sandstorm increases Hero Damage and Ability Power by 1-25% for 1-25 seconds.

name: Seismic Tremors
description: Increases the damage of Drill Smash by 3-39%.

name: Shroom Bloom
description: The mushrooms created by Powder Toss last 1-6 seconds longer.

name: Shroom Gloom
description: Slow intensity of Powder Toss in Purification Form increased by 4-40%.

name: Singularity Power
description: Increases the damage of Singularity Bomb by 4-40% but no longer stuns when it explodes.

name: Smashing Fists
description: Pole Smash or Chi Stomp spawns a Fist dealing 20-620% Ability Power as damage. After a short delay, another Fist emerges dealing 20-1220% Ability Power as damage.

name: Spinning Up
description: The Sentry Turret deals more damage as it strikes enemies, up to a maximum of 10-50% extra damage. Damage increase resets after not attacking for 5 seconds.

name: Anti Air
description: Deals 4-40% additional damage to flying enemies.

name: Boosted Blockade
description: Boost Aura increases blockade health by 2-20%.

name: Burning Strikes
description: 2-20% chance on hit to burn target for 20-180% of your Hero Damage stat as magical fire damage each second for 1-5 seconds.

name: Chi Burst
description: Increases Talisman of Empowerment's Critical Damage boost by 2-20%.

name: Cluster Nades
description: When attacking flying enemies, you have a 10-50% chance on hit to drop a bomb beneath them that deals 110-310% of your Ability Power stat an Damage in a small area.

heroes.name: Apprentice, Gunwitch, Monk, Huntress, Ev2, Mystic, Initiate, Adept, Engineer, Hunter, Frostweaver, Cyborg

name: Concussive Guard
description: Physical Wall has a 4-28% chance to stun enemies on impact, leaving them immobilized for 1-3 seconds.

name: Corruption's Embrace
description: Starfall damage is increased by 4-40% in corrupt form.

name: Cthulhu's Influence
description: While under the effects of corruption, Angry Nimbus has a 3-51% chance to charm enemies for 1-6 seconds.

name: Debilitating Madness
description: Call to Madness increase the target's damage taken by 2-16%.

name: Drenching Broomnado
description: Broom Nado damage increased by 3-39% and its hits have 1-25% chance to drench enemies and slow them by 30% for 1-5 seconds.

name: Earthen Guard
description: Imbues the Royal Guard's shield with earth magic that has a 8-18% chance on dealing damage to unleash a fissure, dealing 200-1,800% of your Tower Health as Earth Damage.

name: Empowered Beam
description: After the Sword Beam collides with 5 targets, it spawns an additional Sword Beam that travels in the same direction as the first dealing 125-425% of your Ability Power stat as damage to each target hit. After colliding with 5 targets it returns to the Squire dealing 125-425% of your Ability Power stat as damage in an area around Squire.

name: Enduring Provocation
description: Provoke lasts an additional 0.5-7.5 seconds.

name: Enhanced Launcher (removed)
description: Anti Gravity Bot Launcher can store an additional 1-15 Anti Gravity Bots.

name: Explosive Arrows
description: Skeletal Archers have a 10-30% chance on hit to fire an explosive arrow dealing an additional 1-25% of Defense Damage.

name: Explosive Guard
description: When the affected tower takes damage, it has 3-35% chance to trigger an explosion and deal 140-500% of its Defense Health as damage to nearby enemies. Does not work with Auras or Traps. This does not destroy the tower.

name: Explosive Poison
description: If an enemy poisoned by the Poison Dart Tower is killed , it detonates dealing 10-150% of the tower's damage stat as damage in a small area around the enemy.

name: Fire For Effect
description: Your explosive Trap has a 15-45% chance to detonate twice without consuming an additional charge.

name: Flaming Knight
description: Knight of the Abyss is now imbued with fire, causing enemies hit to burn for 50-500% of your Ability Power in fire damage over 5 seconds.

name: Flare-Up
description: Elder Dragon has a 5-12.5% chance to deal 12-108% more damage.

name: Focused Current
description: Increases the Defense Damage of the Jellyfish Tower by 25-100%, but reduces the maximum number of targets by 4.

name: Focused Vipers
description: Reduce the number of beams of Sand Viper by 2, but increases Defense Damage by 50-82%.

name: Frostguard
description: Take 16-34% less damage while Arctic Empowerment is active.

name: Frosty Beams
description: 15-25% chance for the Proton Beam to freeze all enemies it touches for 1-2 seconds.

name: Frosty Bind
description: Frostbite slow strength increased by 1-10%.

name: Hardheaded Squids
description: The Artillery Crab's projectiles stun enemies for 2.5s. Deals 10-310% bonus damage to flying enemies and causes them to fall.

name: Heavy Cannonball
description: Cannonball Tower has a 2-45% chance to spawn a rolling cannonball that pierces up to 2-10 targets, dealing 1-28% Defense Damage as physical damage.

name: Heroic Power
description: Increases Heroic Wave's hero damage boost by 4-40%.

name: High Pressure
description: Increases the range of Steam Blast by 3-39%.

name: Inferno
description: Increases the damage of Flame Surge by 4-40%.

name: Madness' Embrace
description: Increases Call to Madness duration by 1-3s.

name: Maelstrom
description: While Lightning Stance is active, the Barbarian's attacks have a 5-25% chance to drench enemies, stunning them for 1.5s-3.5s.

name: Mana Leech
description: Dark Syphon drains 3-39% additional mana.

name: Manabomb Power
description: Increases the damage of Manabomb by 3-39%.

name: Meteor Rain
description: Manabomb opens a portal overhead that spawns meteor that deal 36-1256% of your Ability Power stat as damage to enemies they affect.

name: Mine Blast Damage
description: Anti Gravity Bot damage increased by 3-39%.

name: Mine Heat Compensator
description: The cost of EV's Anti Gravity Bots is reduced by 4-39%.

name: Molten Charge Power
description: Increases Molten Charge damage by 3-39%.

name: Molten Stun
description: Increases Molten Charge stun duration by 0.5-4.5s.

name: One With Chi
description: Increases the damage of Chi Blast by 3-39%.

name: Poison Leaves
description: Dryad's poison attacks deal 2-20% more damage.

name: Read Or Die
description: Scatter Sweep and Broom Vault have an 1-21% chance to transmogrify enemies into books for 3s. Transmogrified enemies take increased damage.

name: Restoring Ice
description: Critical hits from Ice Shards restore 3-21 mana.

name: Scatter Power
description: Increases Scatter Sweep damage by 3-46%.

name: Talon Strike
description: Hawk Strike now stuns for 2s-4.5.

name: Thermal Efficiency
description: The cost of all Cyborg's abilities is reduced by 4-40%.

name: Thunderbolts and Lightning
description: Increases the damage of Arc Lightning by 3-39%.

name: Vampiric Empowerment
description: Increases the Defense Power of the affected tower by 4-60% of its Defense Health.

name: Virus
description: 7-25% chance on hit to Virus the target, dealing 10-90% of your Hero Damage stat as magical Storm damage each second for 3 seconds. Virus enemies take 15% more damage and move 25% slower.

name: Volcanic Shock
description: Volcano has a 2-20% chance to stun all enemies hit for 1-2.8s.

name: Winter's Edge
description: Deal 5-29% extra frost damage on every basic attack scaling with Hero Damage.

name: Back Stab
description: Primary attacks that hit enemies from behind now deal 100-200% of their normal damage.

name: Boiling Blood
description: Causes the Barbarian to take 25-7% of his Max Health as damage, every 5s during combat phase gaining Fury.

name: Boosted Beam
description: Increases the power of the Buff Beam by 22-39%

name: Boosted Power
description: Increases the power of the Boost Aura by 2-20%.

name: Brain Of Confusion
description: When you take damage you have a 3-15% chance to confuse nearby enemies for 3 seconds. This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

name: Colossal Fissure
description: Your Colossus' Direct Command now rips the earth unleashing a fissure that lingers and deals 50-2050% of your Ability Power in damage over 6 seconds, but increases the mana cost of Direct Command by 30-70%. Usable once every 60 seconds.

name: Cosmic Burst
description: Increases the explosion range of Supernova by 8-32% and reduces its fall-off by 18-42%.

name: Crippling Strikes
description: Attacks have a 25% chance to fire a piercing Chi Wave that deals 110-170% Hero Damage as magical damage and Cripple enemies increasing damage taken by 3-15%.

name: Dragon Flare
description: Increases the projectile damage radius of Dragons Nest dragons by 16-64%, and reduces damage falloff by 18-42%.

name: Enhanced Poison
description: Increases the rate of the Poison Dart Tower's poison by 4-39%.

name: Explosive Finale
description: Upon completion, the Arcane Bubble explodes dealing 100-2000% Ability Power damage to all enemies in and around the bubble.

name: Flaming Death
description: EV's mega death laser sets enemies it hits on fire dealing 50-2,050% of EV's Ability Power stat as damage over 10 seconds.

name: Flaming Retribution
description: When you take damage, you have a 2-20% chance of dealing 125-425% of your Armor as fire damage to your attacker.

name: Frost Slayer
description: Deal 4-34% more Hero Weapon damage to frozen enemies.

name: Frosty Power
description: Frostbite tower passes 9-29% of its Defense Power stat to defenses within its frost aura.

name: Gathering Burst
description: Flameburst Tower's fireballs deal more damage the further they travel, up to +20-80% more damage.

name: Greater Rift
description: Increases the damage of Oceanic Rift by 3-39%.

name: Health Pylon
description: Increases the Defense Health of nearby Towers to 102-130%. Does not buff the Tower that equips this shard.

name: Heat Dispenser Module
description: EV upgrades her gun with a new heat dispenser module that drains 3-39% more heat with each primary attack.

name: Howling Feast
description: Your Primary attacks generate 1 Feast stack, while at 10 stacks, increase your Hero Damage by 2-30%. One stack wears off every 3 seconds.

name: Inspired Shout
description: Call to Arms buff increases armor and further increases damage by 3-20%.

name: Mark Targets
description: This defence has a 5-45% chance to place a Mark on its target.

name: Megarock
description: Volcano launches a huge rock dealing 100-225% Defense Damage once every 5 volleys.

name: Molten Core Power
description: Increases Molten Core damage by 3-39%.

name: Momentum
description: Enemies hit by abilities reduce Sweeping strikes ability cooldown by 0.2-0.8s every hit.

name: Nightmare Fuel
description: Enemies affected by Lash Out poison take 20-320% Hero Damage as magical damage when hit by Dark Torment.

name: Pole Power
description: Increases the damage of Pole Smash or Chi Stomp by 3-39%.

name: Power Of Storms
description: You have a 4-10% chance on hit to restore 20 mana per second for 1-3 seconds. 10 seconds cooldown.

heroes.name: Apprentice, Squire, Huntress, Monk, Initiate, Abyss Lord, Adept, Mercenary, Countess, Aquarion, Frostweaver

name: Reckless Shock
description: Enemies hit by the Tesla Coil take 10-25% more damage, but move 50% faster

name: Scatter Striker
description: Increases the range of Scatter Sweep by 3-39%.

name: Serpent God's Protection
description: Towers and Blockades near the Obelisk take 1-10% less damage.

name: Shadow Prince
description: Taking damage has a 7-23% chance to make you take 3-15% less damage and stun attackers for 1.2-4.8 seconds over the duration.

name: Sharpened Spear
description: Magnetic Knight Tower has a 2-20% chance on hit to cause the target to bleed dealing 20-45% of your Tower Damage stat as magical damage each second for 1-5s.

name: Sharpened Spikes
description: Blockade has a 2-30% chance to stun enemies hit for 1-3 seconds.

name: Shattering Stones
description: After an Abyss Stone expires, it detonates dealing 40-2500% of your Ability Power as crushing damage to nearby enemies.

name: Shellshock
description: While Turtle Stance is active the Barbarian's attacks wither enemies hit for 3-13 seconds reducing their damage to 75-35%.

name: Snipe Critical Strike
description: Increases the Crit Chance of Snipe by 2-44%.

name: Unholy Fire
description: Blocking unleashes flames that deal 50-450% of your Armor as damage to enemies in a cone in front of the hero at a rate of twice per second.

name: Water Jet
description: Decrease the number of targets of the Water Aura by -4 but does 50-150% more damage.

name: Water Warrior
description: Increases the Aquarion's melee damage by 20-100%, but reduces the damage of Ice Shards by 30%.

name: Type III Supernova
description: Increases the damage of Supernova by 3-39%.

name: Charged Shot
description: Your primary attacks have a 5-25% chance to fire a fully charged secondary attack. Can only occur once per second.

name: Chi Supercharge
description: Increases Talisman of Empowerment's Defense Power boost by 2-20%.

name: Chilling Pulse
description: The Biometric Scanner emits a chilling wave, making enemies move at 95-71% speed when they are within the zone.

name: Constrictor
description: Defeating an enemy adds a constrictor stack. At 10 stacks, unleashes a bed of constrictor snakes that stun nearby targets for 1-5s. While stunned, enemies take 50-450% Ability Power as magical damage each second for 3 seconds.

name: Enduring Slam
description: Seismic Slam stun duration increased by 0.5-5 seconds.

name: Enhanced Protocols
description: Increases the effects of Drone Overdrive by 103-127%

name: Enhanced Throw
description: Increases the Defense Range of the Magnetic Knight Tower by 4-45%, and increase the Defense Damage by 5-15%.

name: Fiery Brimstone
description: Adds 2-36% Hero Damage to Your Attacks as Magical Fire Damage.

name: Flame Cloak
description: After using Valiant Charge, wreath yourself in flames for 6s. While aflame, you take 5-21% less damage and burn attackers for 400-2000% of your Armor.

name: Focused Lens
description: Increases the damage of Orbital Cannon by 3-39%.

name: Frostsplinter
description: Increases the damage of Icicle Fragmentation by 4-40%.

name: Ghost Arrows
description: The arrows of the Nether Archer can now bounce 1-4 additional times.

name: Giant Shells
description: Increases the projectile damage radius of the Artillery Crab Tower by 6-70%, and increases its Defense Damage by 8-32%.

name: Glacier
description: Every 10 attacks, Hailstorm Tower fires an icy boulder that explodes on impact dealing 75-175% of Defense Damage as damage in a small area.

name: Goat Transmog
description: 3-15% Chance on hit of Crippling Chi Wave to transmog enemies into goats for 3 seconds, transmoged enemies take 1-10% more damage.

name: Hailstorm Cascade
description: Ice Shards have a 18-50% chance to spawn an additional ice shard, dealing 500-1,300% of your Hero Damage stat.

name: Heroic Boost
description: Increases Heroic Wave's healing done by 3-39%.

name: Life Leech
description: Your primary attacks heal you for 0.2-1% of your max health.

name: Mage Gambit
description: Increases your Ability Power by 10-50%, but increase damage taken from enemies by 60-20%.

name: Mana Capacitor
description: Increases your maximum ability resource by 10-100.

heroes.name: Apprentice, Squire, Monk, Huntress, Abyss Lord, Ev2, Gunwitch, Lavamancer, Dryad, Initiate, Adept, Mercenary, Countess, Engineer, Aquarion, Frostweaver, Cyborg

name: Manufacturer's Overcharge
description: Weapon Manufacturer charges 4-40% faster.

name: Node Increase
description: EV can create 1-4 extra node(s) in any single Weapon Manufacturer chain.

name: Obelisk Shield
description: Obelisk Shield absorption increased to 10-70%.

name: Oily Entrapment
description: Increases Oil Geyser slow rate by 3-15%.

name: Poisoned Blades
description: Combat Preparation now applies poison to your blades for 5s, causing you to deal 50-110% of your Hero Damage as poison damage on melee attacks.

name: Polar Efficiency
description: Reduce the mana cost of Flurry by 1-38%.

name: Power Gambit
description: Increases your Hero Damage by 10-50%, but increase damage taken from enemies by 60-20%.

name: Power Pylon
description: Increases the Defense Power of nearby defenses to 102-120%. Does not buff the Tower that equips this Shard.

name: Proton Cannon Insulator
description: Reduces the heat generation rate of Proton Charge by 2-20%.

name: Proton Supercharge
description: EV's Proton Charge deals an extra 10-210% of your ability power stat as damage while its max range is increased by 5-25%.

name: Ramster Power
description: Increases the damage of Ramster Direct Command by 5-35%.

name: Ravenhost
description: Your primary attacks generate Raven stacks. Once you reach 10 stacks, the stacks are depleted to fire a magical Raven dealing 10-210% of your Ability Power as damage. Bounces 5 times.

name: Restoring Snipe
description: Snipe critical hits restore 4-40 Broom Power.

name: Ride the Lightning
description: Increase the damage bonus of Lightning Stance by 1-21%.

name: Serpent's Kiss
description: Secondary Attacks inflict poison on enemies, dealing 10-210% of Hero Health as damage per second for 1-5 seconds.

name: Snipe Critical Power
description: Increases the total critical damage of Snipe by 20-140%.

name: Splody Harpoon
description: Ballista projectiles have a 10-45% chance to detonate on each target hit dealing 1-41% of the Defense Damage as extra damage in small area.

name: Tectonic Breaker
description: While Inflamed, deal 10-275% Armor Stat as crushing Earth damage and 10-275% Hero Damage as Fire damage every 3rd primary attack.

name: Twice As Bright
description: Eruption now increases Defense Power to 10-70%, but the duration is reduced by -5 seconds.

name: Viscous Oil
description: The oil effect from Oil Catapult now slows enemies by an additional 2-8%, and also slows their attack speed by 8-20%.

name: Wreckless
description: The Barbarian deals up to 0.5-20.5% bonus damage based upon current Wrath.

name: Onsen Bath (Xbox Only)
description: 20% chance for Cannonball Tower to fire a steamy blast dealing 20-500% Defense Power as water damage and drenching enemies for 3s.

name: Withering Blast
description: Enemies damaged by Arcane Barrier take 5-20% increased damage for 1.5-3 seconds.

source.difficulty: Chaos 7, Revenge of the Yeti Incursion

name: Block Power
description: Increases the blocking power of the shield by 5-25%.

name: Buckshot
description: Increases the knockback of the Flak Cannon by 4-22%.

name: Celestial Power
description: Falling stars give an additional 6-22 celestial power.

name: Chi Burn
description: Enemies inside Chi Aura burn for 500-2,100% of your Ability Power as magic damage every second.

name: Death's Grasp
description: When you defeat an enemy, you generate a charge, up to a max of 5. When you block with your shield, all charges are then consumed each unleashing a fireball that deals 10-210% of your Ability Power as magical fire damage.

name: Double Tap
description: Your Skeletal Archers have a 15-45% chance to fire twice in succession.

name: Enduring Bubble
description: Increases Viper's Fang bubble duration by 1-2 seconds.

name: Enduring Price
description: Two at Twice the Price lasts 1-7s longer.

name: Escape Artist
description: Reduces the time of disabling effects you sustain by 0-37.5%.

name: Extended Charge
description: Drone Overdrive duration increased by 0.5-5 seconds.

name: Freezing Vault
description: Freezes the target for 1-4 seconds and your vault now deals an extra 4-16% damage.

name: Frost Storm
description: While Blizzard's Embrace is active, create a storm around you that deals 50-610% of your Ability Power over time.

name: Harbinger's Exile (removed)
description: Training Dummy has a 1-9% chance to teleport targets back to spawner.
